mapper.insert: insert into recipeboard(no, user_no, title, sub_title, recipe_name, user_nickname, time, cost, content, servings) values(recipeboard_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{subTitle}, #{recipeName}, #{userNickName}, #{time}, #{cost}, #{content}, #{servings})
insert into recipe_ingredients(no,r_no, i_no, amount) values(recipe_ingredients_seq.nextval,(select max(no) from recipeboard), #{ing}, #{amount})
insert into recipe_tags(no,r_no, t_no) values(recipe_tags_seq.nextval ,(select max(no) from recipeboard), #{tag})
mapper.select: select no as tagNO, type tagType, name tagName from tags order by no
select no as ingNo, name ingName, type ingType from ingredients order by no

select no, user_no as userNo, title, sub_title as subTitle, time, cost, content , user_nickname as userNickName, recipe_name as recipeName, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as regDate , view_cnt as viewCnt, servings from recipeboard where no = #{no}
select t.name as tagName, t.type as tagType, t.no as tagNo from recipe_tags r, tags t, recipeboard b where b.no = r.r_no and t.no = r.t_no and b.no = #{no} order by t.no

select i.name as ingName, r.amount as amount, i.type as ingType, i.no as ingNo from recipeboard b, recipe_ingredients r, ingredients i where b.no = r.r_no and i.no = r.i_no and b.no = #{no} order by i.no

select X.rnum, X.no, X.user_no as userNo, X.title, x.sub_title as subTitle, X.time, X.cost, X.content , X.user_nickname as userNickName, X.recipe_name as recipeName, to_char(X.reg_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as regDate , X.view_cnt as viewCnt, X.servings from ( select rownum as rnum, A.no, A.user_no, A.title, A.sub_title, A.time, A.cost, A.content , A.user_nickname, A.recipe_name, A.reg_date, A.view_cnt, A.servings from ( select no, user_no, title, sub_title, time, cost, content, user_nickname, recipe_name, reg_date, view_cnt, servings from recipeboard order by reg_date desc) A where rownum <= #{page}*10) X where X.rnum >= (#{page}*10)-9

select X.rnum, X.no, X.user_no as userNo, X.title, x.sub_title as subTitle, X.time, X.cost, X.content , X.user_nickname as userNickName, X.recipe_name as recipeName, to_char(X.reg_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as regDate , X.view_cnt as viewCnt, X.servings from ( select rownum as rnum, A.no, A.user_no, A.title, A.sub_title, A.time, A.cost, A.content , A.user_nickname, A.recipe_name, A.reg_date, A.view_cnt, A.servings from ( select no, user_no, title, sub_title, time, cost, content, user_nickname, recipe_name, reg_date, view_cnt, servings from recipeboard order by no desc) A where rownum <= #{startPage}+(#{numPerPage}-1)) X where X.rnum >= #{startPage}
select count(*) from recipeboard where rownum > 0
mapper.update: update recipeboard set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where no = #{no}
